name: МЕМОЛОГИЯ
description:
MEMOLOGY is a comprehensive test that shows how deeply you are immersed in the culture of memes. In the game you will find many international, new or already classic memes, such as: Pepe, Dogi and so on, but MEMOLOGY is still recommended for people who are at least a little familiar with the Russian language, as there are a lot of Russian memes and references in the tests.

Gameplay Features

  • Wide Putin, Narrow Putin, Dancing Putin
  • Cats and other Internet symbols
  • Bouncy soundtrack
